company_info.Company Description: Thank you for giving us an opportunity to present Integrated Recruitment Solutions from Shine.com – HT Media Ltd, India’s 2nd largest Job Board to your esteemed organization.We are confident that our solutions will reduce your turnaround time, enhance your productivity with easy to use interface, and maximize the return on investment.

api_data.job_title: Urgent hiring for Travel Industry voice & Backend & Email  Process

jd_information.description: Dear Candidate,Greetings!!!Shiva Job Services (FBD)We have urgent hiring for Voice & Non Voice process in Travel MNC Company.Job location in Gurgaon.Good Communication.5 days working.Rotational Shift.Fresher & Experience both can apply.Under Gradduate & Graduate both are welccome.Sal 12 to 23k depend on interview.Any GDS (Amadeus/Sabre/Galileo/Apollo/World span) Knowledge.Contact us for apply this job Asap. Thanks & RegardsBhawana Gupta7838118827
